name: Mini Royale Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (2 Ghz or more)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 / RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: I7 7700 / Ryzen 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
